name: status
description: Run accessibility scan (axe-core) and HTML validation across several URLs

scripts.ci-scan: evaluatory --config "config.json" --no-open-results && npm run ci-header && npm run ci-footer
scripts.ci-footer: sed -i -e 's|Handmade with ♥|Powered by Evaluatory. Handmade with ♥|g' reports/*.html
scripts.scan: evaluatory --config "config.json" --output "local-reports" && npm run header && npm run footer
scripts.footer: sed -i -e 's|Handmade with ♥|Powered by Evaluatory. Handmade with ♥|g' local-reports/*.html

author: Jason Morris
